scenarios.name: Captain Phillips
scenarios.task: Steal and equip the Captain's uniform and ID badge, then successfully depart the sub.

scenarios.name: A Sinking Feeling
scenarios.task:
Disable all the main floor pumps and the airlock, then find a way to scuttle the sub.
Escape.

scenarios.name: Darkness, Imprisoning Me
scenarios.task: Disable at least 50% of the ships batteries. Cause a reactor meltdown and depart the sub... *With* the surplus stock of uranium.

scenarios.name: Breaking Bad
scenarios.task:
Cause the Security Officer to experience psychosis by injecting them with Methamphetamines.
Plant some drugs on them and escape via the diving bell.

scenarios.name: The Cask of Amontillado
scenarios.task:
Handcuff another crew member inside a ballast tank, then successfully weld the hatch closed.
You win if they drown before they are discovered.

scenarios.name: Houston We've Had A Problem
scenarios.task: Cause an explosion that destroys the ship's oxygen generator and then successfully return to the station you left from.

scenarios.name: MURMAIDER
scenarios.task: Murder everyone in the crew in a unique fashion, then join the creatures beneath the sea.

scenarios.name: World Disarmament Conference
scenarios.task:
Remove every (lethal) weapon from the sub, then handcuff everyone else.
Stun and grab, then move cuffs to their inventory and click the bar above the item to equip it to them ;)

scenarios.name: Interspacial Weapons Deals
scenarios.task: Smuggle a shipment of at least 20 fuel rods from the sub to a station.
